General.Name: Bastas Baskent Cimento Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Bastas Baskent Cimento Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells cement, clinker, ready-mixed concrete, and lime products in Turkey. The Company was founded in 1967 and is based in Ankara, Turkey. Bastas Baskent Cimento Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Parficim S.A.
